flawed_nl_solution:
The sandbox is 3' long, 3' wide so the sq footage of the sandbox is 3*3 = <<3*3=9>>9 sq ft
He needs 9 sq ft of sand to fill the sandbox and he can buy it in 3 sq ft bags so he needs 9/3 = <<9/3=3>>3 bags of sand
The sand costs $4 a bag and he needs 3 bags so it will cost him 4*3 = $<<4*3=21>>21 in sand

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12.0, not 21.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
